channel.title: Anyone want to help? I'm new. whoever helps gets co
channel.description:
Ok guys i am kinda new at making a server so please be patient. I have the latest version of Java.(1.6.0_17) [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/142ycnb.jpg[/img] I really don't see the problem. Here's what's in the coding for the compiler. [code]@echo off color 0a title pk-life Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit[/code]
Here's what i see [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ikb3ty.jpg[/img]
Can any one help. I'll Rep++

item.title: Anyone want to help? I'm new. whoever helps gets co
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

mod please lock, got answers.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2009, 10:11:31 pm[/size][hr]nvm, i downloaded the latest version of jdk, i have the latest version of java and it still won’t work. can someone either give me some coding to put into my compiler or, put a link that will do the same.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2009, 09:24:43 am[/size][hr]anyone…?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

@echo off @title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause exit

Ok guys i am kinda new at making a server so please be patient.
I have the latest version of Java.(1.6.0_17)

I really don’t see the problem.
Here’s what’s in the coding for the compiler.

@echo off color 0a title pk-life Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit
